p: Probing of TGEV antigen in small intestinal enterocytes by immunofluorescence (IF) (Pensaert et al. 1970) or immunohistochemical (IHC) (Shoup et al. 1996) techniques using monoclonal antibodies (MAb) against the highly conserved TGEV N protein may be conducted for formalin-fixed or frozen tissues harvested in the early stage of infection.
